item.title: Himbos of Myth and Mettle, The Curse of the House of Rookwood, Apocalypse Keys
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

@Sandy and @edige23 bring on @swordqueen to talk about these games, the upcoming Apocalypse Keys Kickstarter, weights, processes, moving, and more.

THE GAUNTLET

Himbos of Myth and Mettle, The Curse of the House of Rookwood, Apocalypse Keys

iTunes:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/the-gauntlet-podcast/id951113347?mt=2 RSS:  http://gauntletpodcast.libsyn.com/rss

Follow the Apocalypse Keys KS here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/evilhat/apocalypse-keys
